articles.title: “New India” Officially Entered Into Recession with 7.5% shrink in Economy. Congratulations To PM Modi For Working So Hard For 18 Hours To Achieve This Position - Inventiva
articles.description: The Indian economy has Officially hit a Technical Recession, with the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) contracting to 7.5% in the July – September period. The economy rebounded from a record slump of 2…
articles.content:
The Indian economy has Officially hit a Technical Recession, with the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) contracting to 7.5% in the July September period.

articles.title: UK could become first Western country to approve a COVID-19 vaccine - Yahoo India News
articles.description: On Friday, the government wrote to the Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency, asking it to review the Astrazeneca-Oxford University vaccine.
articles.content: The UK ordered 40 million doses of the two-shot product developed by US drugmaker Pfizer and the German biotech firm BioNTech, which is said to be 95% effective at preventing COVID-19. Photo: Joel Sa… [+4068 chars]

articles.author: Bar & Bench
articles.title: SEBI bars NDTV promoters Prannoy and Radhika Roy from dealing in securities market - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
articles.description: SEBI has barred NDTV promoters Prannoy and Radhika Roy from dealing in the securities market for two years.
articles.content:
SEBI, therefore, passed the following orders:
(a) Mr. Prannoy Roy and Mrs. Radhika Roy shall, jointly or severally, disgorge the amount of wrongful gain of 16,97,38,335 as computed in the show cause… [+523 chars]
